name: EVOLAGE
description:
Developed for HUJAM

Increase vitality by arranging critical species living in habitats in the correct proportions. Watch out for meteorites. Let's see if you can reach homo sapiens.

Evolve living things until the world comes to Homo sapiens age.

"Mouse" for spin the world.

Game Developer - ÖMER FIRAT

2D Design - İBRAHİM DURMUŞ
